flowchart.name: Flowchart
examples:
flowchart TD
Node1[Label Text] --> Node2{Decision}
Node2 -->|Option A| Node3[Result A]
Node2 -->|Option B| Node4[Result B]
tips: Node IDs must be single words without spaces
Labels go INSIDE brackets: A[My Label]
Use --> for arrows, -->|text| for labeled arrows

sequenceDiagram.name: Sequence Diagram
sequenceDiagram.edgeSyntax: A ->> B: message or A -->> B: dotted message
examples:
sequenceDiagram
participant Entity1
participant Entity2
Entity1 ->> Entity2: Message description
Entity2 -->> Entity1: Response description
tips: Use 'as' for display names: participant U as User
Can use actor instead of participant

classDiagram.name: Class Diagram
examples:
classDiagram
class ClassName {
+String attribute
+method()
}
class AnotherClass
ClassName <|-- AnotherClass
tips: Define classes with attributes and methods
